ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Crowd control and lament pulling (was grouping thread on the Ever quest boards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oooh! I like! I like! I d probably drop the group chat line as I seem to have a problem every now and then with the /assist command, to help eliminate spam.
ygData.messageBody:
Oooh! I like! I like!

I'd probably drop the group chat line as I seem to have a problem every now
and then with the /assist command, to help eliminate spam. Sometimes it
doesn't pick up the target of the person who I am assisting, so I push the
"assist" button several times.

---Windleaf

At 09:51 AM 6/28/00 -0400, you wrote:
>How to get your pet to attack what the party is beating on:
>
>Hot Key "Assist"
>/g I'm so darn charming!
>/assist <tank name>
>/pet attack
>
>
